name: Cyclops
desc: High Water Park and Play does not get any better than this! Although it is large it is really flushy so watch the corners of the wave on the surge as they tend to disappear. Not for the faint of heart this feature comes in at 35,000 cfs and gets better with more water. Be sure to bring a camera.

name: Cliff Left
desc: Incredible green wave with marginal eddy service. This is typically a catch on the fly wave, but the eddy can be cought for repeat rides.

name: Dirty Mother
desc: Large brown wave with eddie service, but dont let the size fool you, this feature is very shallow under the wave.
